name: Porchlight (andreimarks)
description:
Status: seems to work okay, haven't check though after Unity 5/WebGL upgrade.

=--==--==--=

Porchlight was made for the Philly Dev Night One Letter Jam.

The basic idea of the jam was that you'd take the name of an existing game, and then replace, add, or remove a single letter. I went with Porchlight, a take on Torchlight. Initially, I was going to make this sort of an action RPG type game like Torchlight, but the final playable version here is way stripped down. Elements that survived are a randomly generated world, and a pseudo-experience earning system and modifiable abilities/strengths. The game won the game jam.
